subject: AI & Agents
title: Interpretability: Opening the Black Box
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Interpretability: Opening the Black Box.

hook.text: The model denied the loan but can't explain why. Regulators demand an explanation.

buildup.text: Interpretability research aims to understand what happens inside neural networks.

discovery.text: Techniques: attention visualization, probing classifiers, mechanistic interpretability.

twist.text: We can find individual circuits (e.g., 'induction heads') but can't explain the full model yet.

climax.text: Interpretability is essential for trust, debugging, and regulatory compliance.

punchline.text: You can't trust what you can't understand.

quiz.question: Why is interpretability important?
options: For trust, debugging, and regulatory compliance
